**Your question**
What would you like to know?

**Context**
- What are you trying to do?
- What have you tried so far?
- Which part of the project is this about? (core library, desktop app, integrations)

> **Privacy reminder:** Do not post API keys, filesystem paths, personal data, or internal business information.
